onboarding_step1.question: How was your mental energy today? Briefly describe it.

onboarding_step2.question: What has been draining you the most lately?

onboarding_step3.question: What would be a small step this week that would make you feel good?
onboarding_step3.details: Small enough that you can do it right now.

primer.hero_subtitle_big: If you're ready for your first free analysis, let's get started.

softwall.title: Your analysis will illuminate your potential.
softwall.subtitle: If you're ready to discover the personal analysis prepared from your answers, let's take this first step. You're not alone on this journey.
softwall.feature_pattern_desc: Discover the connections between your answers and what they reveal about you.
softwall.feature_potential_desc: See the strength and opportunities behind what drains you.
softwall.feature_step_desc: A personalized start to help you achieve that small goal you mentioned.

recall.title: Shall we return to your previous report?
recall.subtitle: Your answers weren't saved but they're still here. You can sign up in 1 minute to see your analysis.
recall.motivation_text: Keep progressing by continuing from where you left off.

auth.enter_info_register: Enter your details for a fresh start.
auth.error_password_length: Your password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.error_nickname_required: Please specify how you'd like us to address you.
auth.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.forgot_password_subtitle: Enter your account email and we'll send you a recovery link.
auth.check_your_email_subtitle: A password reset link has been sent to {{email}}.

analysis.title: Deep Analysis
analysis.subtitle: Initial impressions, insights and concrete plan
analysis.processing_text: Your account is being created and your first report is being prepared...

illustration.title: Take Care of Your Mind
illustration.subtitle: Experience discovering your blind spots with AI support

actions.weekly_insight_ready: Your Weekly Insight Discovery is Ready!

feedback_modal.title: Your Daily Reflection
feedback_modal.subtitle: My thoughts on your emotions today
feedback_modal.satisfaction_question: How was this response? Your feedback is valuable to us.

premium.title: Daily Limit Reached
premium.description: You can write 1 mood entry per day. With Premium, you can write unlimited daily entries.

prompt.placeholder: Write your feelings and thoughts of today here...

input_modal.title: How Are You Today?
input_modal.subtitle: Share your feelings and thoughts safely
input_modal.placeholder: Would you like to share what's on your mind?

index.empty_subtext: Tap the button below to get your first dream analysis.
index.delete_error_body: An issue occurred while deleting the dream.

analyze.header_subtext: Write the message emerging from your mind's depths.
analyze.placeholder: In the silence of the night, what emerged in my mind...
analyze.helper_privacy: Stays private, only used for analysis.
analyze.error_too_short: Please describe your dream in more detail.
analyze.error_limit_reached: You have reached the daily dream analysis limit.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.question: Did you find this analysis and connections useful?

oracle.title: Go Deeper
oracle.subtitle: See hidden links and action steps beneath the surface.
oracle.error_generic: Analysis is not possible right now. Please try again later.
oracle.toast_save_error_body: Deep analysis result could not be saved.

profile.title: Profile & Preferences
profile.subtitle: Make your journey your own.
profile.toast_name_required: Name field cannot be left blank.
profile.toast_error_body: An issue occurred while updating profile.
profile.error_loading: Profile could not be loaded. Please try again.

security.title: Security Control Panel
security.subtitle: Manage and monitor your account security here.
security.alert_signOut_body: Are you sure you want to end your session on this device?

password.title: Password Update
password.subtitle: Keep your account security at the highest level.
password.alert_mismatch_body: The new passwords you entered do not match.
password.alert_weak_body: Password must be at least 8 characters, contain uppercase/lowercase letters and numbers.
password.alert_same_body: Your new password cannot be the same as your current password.
password.error_auth: User identity could not be verified.
password.error_wrong_password: Your current password is incorrect. Please check.
password.alert_success_body: Your password has been changed securely.

subscription.title: Unlock Your Potential
subscription.subtitle: Open a new page in your mental health journey with unlimited access.
subscription.toast_success_body: Congratulations, you have upgraded to {{planName}} plan.

featuredCard.premium_subtitle: You are enjoying all the privileges
featuredCard.free_subtitle: Get unlimited access to all features
